resources.string:
Alpha Release 2
 This is a life simulator, based on those elements:
 Plants: its the main food for the animal spices, you can setup the plants variables on plants tab.
 Rain: can modify behaviour of plants growing, you can setup the rain variables on plants tab.
 Spices: Modify behaviour of two spices, compiting for the resources (plants), you can setup the spicies variables on spices tab.
 Sim tab: you can see the simulation on sim tab (you can stop, start or exit the simulation with menu options)
 This is a very schematic vision of the simulator, if you want more information, a tutorial and / or give me some feedback, visit:
 https://github.com/ferriman/LifeProject/wiki
 Thanks!
